game.name: Moto Hill Bike Racing
game.description:
The amazing desert environment is waiting for you. Choose your level and be prepared to show off intense driving skills on two wheels in this brand new racing thrill “Moto Hill Bike Racing”! We can understand that riding around a crowded city can be a bore activity to do for a daredevil like you. So, we have got you covered with the pretty challenging and addictive racing tracks here. The surface is rough and you will find out the hills everywhere. Do you think that you have the skill to clear each track without a scratch?

Get yourself ready to adapt your ride to terrain in this free online bike game! Try to slow your motorbike down when you downhill and speed it up when uphill! Your objective in this online motorbike game is to complete each level without dying. Avoid the putting the pressure on your mind like a real-life biker carries when he handles a bike on a real road! It is all about mastering the controls of this game and you will clear all its levels with ease. 

This cool html5 motorbike game features 24 challenging levels, colorful 2D graphics, intuitive controls and entertaining gameplay. Keep your eyes on the top of the screen to see your position in each level! Show off your two-wheeler driving skills, pass all levels and prove the world that you are the best motorcycle rider in your city! Enjoy freedom and speed in our one of the most popular online motorcycle games, no install required! Make some death-defying flips without hurting your bike! Grab coins to purchase new motorbike models!
